title: Zero Trust organization
description: A Zero Trust organization defines the user login experience.

links.title: Get your Zero Trust organization
links.description: Returns the configuration for your Zero Trust organization.

links.title: Create your Zero Trust organization
links.description: Sets up a Zero Trust organization for your account.
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/organizations" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"Widget Corps Internal Applications","auth_domain":"test.cloudflareaccess.com","login_design":{"background_color":"#c5ed1b","text_color":"#c5ed1b","logo_path":"https://example.com/logo.png","header_text":"This is an example description.","footer_text":"This is an example description."}}'

name.description: The name of your Zero Trust organization.

auth_domain.description: The unique subdomain assigned to your Zero Trust organization.

login_design.example:
{
  "background_color": "#c5ed1b",
  "text_color": "#c5ed1b",
  "logo_path": "https://example.com/logo.png",
  "header_text": "This is an example description.",
  "footer_text": "This is an example description."
}

background_color.description: The background color on your login page.

text_color.description: The text color on your login page.

logo_path.description: The URL of the logo on your login page.

header_text.description: The text at the top of your login page.

footer_text.description: The text at the bottom of your login page.

links.title: Update your Zero Trust organization
links.description: Updates the configuration for your Zero Trust organization.
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/organizations" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"Widget Corps Internal Applications","auth_domain":"test.cloudflareaccess.com","login_design":{"background_color":"#c5ed1b","text_color":"#c5ed1b","logo_path":"https://example.com/logo.png","header_text":"This is an example description.","footer_text":"This is an example description."}}'

auth_domain.description: The unique subdomain assigned to your Zero Trust organization.

  "background_color": "#c5ed1b",
  "text_color": "#c5ed1b",
  "logo_path": "https://example.com/logo.png",

text_color.description: The text color on your login page.

logo_path.description: The URL of the logo on your login page.

header_text.description: The text at the top of your login page.

footer_text.description: The text at the bottom of your login page.

links.title: Delete your Zero Trust organization
links.description: Deletes your Zero Trust organization. **WARNING: This will delete everything related to Zero Trust on your account.**

links.title: Revoke all Access tokens for a user
links.description: Revokes a user's access across all applications.

email.description: The email of the user to revoke.
